    • addInformation

    • onItemRightClick

      @NotNull public @NotNull net.minecraft.util.ActionResult<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> onItemRightClick(@NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.world.World worldIn, net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity playerIn, @NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.util.Hand handIn)
      Called when player uses the item. If it's empty it tries to pick up fluid source block . If it contains fluid, it searches recipie matching the fluid in recipes of type exaqua:handsieve . If it finds the recipie it lowers fluid amount by 1 and drops item from recipie (if random rool succeed). If it doesn't find any recipie for the fluid, it empties itself and returns fail, otherwise it returns succes
      Overrides:
      onItemRightClick in class net.minecraft.item.Item
      Returns:
      Fail if it doesn't find any recipie for the fluid, othervise succes.
